en.today: Luna drifts into Pisces and the sector of your chart that governs all things hidden, dearest Aries, putting you in a reflective and observant mood. Take a deep dive into your psyche, as the stars reveal patterns, opinions, and ideas you haven't had access to previously. The new moon rises this evening, asking you to think carefully about what you want the next six months to look like—set intentions around self-improvement and closing chapters to make the most of this lunation. Watch out for obsessive thoughts when Jupiter stirs later tonight, which could cause you to overthink.

en.today: You'll be in the mood to shed layers and get intimate, dearest Leo, as Luna enters Pisces and the sector of your chart that governs commitment. This highly intuitive lunar placement offers insights into what others are thinking, especially when it comes to business and matters of the heart. Use this evening's new moon to have transparent conversations about what you want the next six months to look like. Focus intensely on your responsibility to transform along with your ambitions, acknowledging the journey of emotional evolution. Avoid turning to friends for advice when Jupiter stirs, coming to your conclusions before opening the door for debate.

en.today: Survey your social kingdom with pride, dear Taurus, as Lady Luna drifts into Pisces and the sector of your chart that governs the community. A fierce appreciation for the ties you've cultivated will cause you to think more deeply about the relationships you are most comfortable with in addition to those you hope to develop further. This evening's new moon presents opportunities to enter uncharted territory, nudging you to explore unfamiliar cultural events, connections, and establishments. Consider how expanding your network could lead to prosperity and new opportunities down the line, but don't let it drive your decisions.

kh.today: ធ្វើការស្ទង់ព្រះរាជាណាចក្រកម្ពុជាដោយមោទនភាព Taurus ជាទីស្រឡាញ់នៅពេលដែលស្ត្រី Luna បានរសាត់ទៅក្នុង Pisces និងវិស័យនៃតារាងរបស់អ្នកដែលគ្រប់គ្រងសហគមន៍។ការកោតសរសើរយ៉ាងសាហាវចំពោះទំនាក់ទំនងដែលអ្នកបានដាំដុះនឹងធ្វើឱ្យអ្នកគិតកាន់តែស៊ីជម្រៅអំពីទំនាក់ទំនងដែលអ្នកមានផាសុខភាពបំផុតក្នុងការបន្ថែមលើអ្នកដែលអ្នកសង្ឃឹមថានឹងបានអភិវឌ្ឍបន្ថែមទៀត។ព្រះច័ន្ទថ្មីនៅល្ងាចនេះបានបង្ហាញពីឱកាសចូលទឹកដីដែលមិនមានមូលដ្ឋានដោយអាក្រាតកាយឱ្យអ្នកស្វែងយល់ពីព្រឹត្តិការណ៍វប្បធម៌ដែលមិនធ្លាប់ស្គាល់ការតភ្ជាប់និងគ្រឹះស្ថានដែលមិនធ្លាប់មាន។ពិចារណាពីរបៀបដែលការពង្រីកបណ្តាញរបស់អ្នកអាចនាំឱ្យមានភាពរុងរឿងនិងឱកាសថ្មីធ្លាក់ចុះប៉ុន្តែកុំឱ្យវាជំរុញការសម្រេចចិត្តរបស់អ្នក។

en.today: You'll be reminded that your work within long-term goals is far from over, dear Gemini, as Luna enters Pisces and your solar tenth house. Luckily, small victories will help you stay emotionally locked in, offering boosts to your confidence, resilience, and motivation. Zoom out to view things with a broader lens under tonight's new moon, drawing inspiration from where you hope to be six months from now. Try to strategize the milestones that will elevate your situation professionally and within the public eye. Just be mindful not to overextend yourself, keeping timelines reasonable while Jupiter activates later tonight.
